body.name: Forbidden Throne: An LGBTQ+ Fantasy Novella
body.description: Not all Queens need a King.As the youngest daughter of seven, Rosalyn never had the luxury of wearing pretty dresses like her sisters. From the moment of birth, she was kept hidden away, only to later be presented to the kingdom as the next male to rule after her late father, King Byron.With her coronation but a week away, bordering countries flocked to the castle in hopes of a match with Prince Stefan. Rosalyn wanted none of that. But as soon as Helena, the dragon princess, stepped through the doors of the great hall, a burning desire consumed her, setting into motion events that would turn her world upside down.Could her kingdom accept her as a ruling queen without a king, or would she be forced to renounce her title? But Rosalyn isn’t as concerned with that as she is about Helena finding out her true identity. Because as fated mates, would Helena reject her for being a woman? Read more

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #317,716 in Kindle Store (See Top 100 in Kindle Store) #653 in Two-Hour LGBTQ+ Short Reads #852 in Two-Hour Science Fiction & Fantasy Short Reads #1,679 in LGBTQ+ Fantasy (Kindle Store)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I want more! Short but good!
reviews.reviewText: This story is short but I really enjoyed it. I hope she writes more femme women loving women stories with possessive dragons! I bought this book and I will be following this author to see if she brings out anymore books like this in the future. Quick read but totally worth it. She packed a lot into those few pages. Highly recommend:)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It’s an uncomplicated coming out fantasy with two women paired by a mystical bond (love at first sight + magic, sorta?). It was ok but didn’t really push into any of the interesting territory you can reach from “forced to pretend you’re a diff gender growing up”.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars A little too short
reviews.reviewText: I liked the story, it wasn't unique but it was fun. It was disappointingly short. Everything about it could have been more fleshed out. There wasn't really any tension or anticipation. You could see how it would end after the first chapter. But it made me happy so I will give it 3 stars. Because for how shortly was, it did a good job.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long live the Queen!
reviews.reviewText: First time reading this author and it will not be the last! My only complaint is this book was so short! Get this author’s books and leave your reviews.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars enjoyable read, but too short
reviews.reviewText: A fun and enjoyable read with an interesting cast and setting. And dragons ^^ For the price being asked, it was worth picking up, though I do wish that it had been longer with a bit more depth and exploration.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I want more
reviews.reviewText: I love the concept of the story. I wish there was more to it. I would had loved to see more character development like the main character getting a chance to finally wear a beautiful dress and go through conflict, drama, and adventure. Neither the less this was a very good short shorty.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It felt rushed and unrealistic, even considering that it's a fantasy short story. And the mother didn't make sense, one moment she's trying to choke her daughter to death and the next she's hugging her and saying she only wanted the best for her

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Good read
reviews.reviewText: This book had all the elements. Drama, attraction, love and a happy ending. I really enjoyed this sweet fast read!
I enjoyed reading this story very much.The story flowed beautifully through each stage of the telling.Thank you Jennifer for a lovely dragon story.
